titles.title: Behold Me Standing At The Door (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Behold Me standing at the door And hear Me pleading evermore Say weary heart oppressed with sin May I come in May I come in{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Behold Me standing at the door And hear Me pleading evermore With gentle voice Oh heart of sin May I come in May I come in{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I bore the cruel thorns for thee I waited long and patiently Say weary heart oppressed with sin May I come in May I come in{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I would not plead with thee in vain Remember all My grief and pain I died to ransom thee from sin May I come in May I come in{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I bring thee joy from heaven above I bring thee pardon peace and love Say weary heart oppressed with sin May I come in May I come in{/lang-eng}
